name: Endless Invasion (itch)
description:
The year is 2600, and the message from another planet that we've always been waiting for has finally come. What we didn't expect, though, is that they would send a 2000's CD-ROM containing a .zip archive, with a readme.txt that says "one of our Alientari classics, pls enjoy and give feedback".

Basic commands:

  • SPACE - shoot
  • LEFT/A and RIGHT/D - move
  • ESC - pause

Fourth game created for Complete C# Unity Developer 2D - Learn to Code Making Games

A simple recreation of Space Invaders, made to learn about more Unity concepts. There is a server side leaderboard, which took longer to (hopefully) make it work than I innocently expected. I've decided to only use shades of green/grey and basic shapes to keep the visual simple.

Obs: if the leaderboard doesn't show, it's because the web server is inactive for one hour each day.

English is not my main language so there can be some typos.

Music: Legna Zeg - Escape
